pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Estimation of the Additive Main Effects and Multiplicative Interaction Model // Performs Bayesian estimation of the additive main effects and multiplicative interaction (AMMI) model. The method is explained in Crossa, J., Perez-Elizalde, S., Jarquin, D., Cotes, J.M., Viele, K., Liu, G. and Cornelius, P.L. (2011) (doi:10.2135/cropsci2010.06.0343).
